translation.en: What was the loan for?
Against our advice.
Chairman took a loan to acquire...
translation.es: El presidente pidió un préstamo para comprar…

translation.en: One hundred luxurious buses.
For the BRT contract and now it's time to pay up.
translation.es: Para el contrato del TRA. Y llegó la hora de pagar.

translation.en: Okay.
Okay. Let's not panic. So what do we do?
Pay up your debt.
In 30 days.
Or, risk losing everything.
translation.es: Si no, corre el riesgo de perderlo todo.

translation.en: Good day.
Now, wait, auditor. Auditor.
Auditor.
No, wait, I have something to chip in.
One billion!
Why would Ernest go to borrow one billion? What for?
translation.es: ¿Para qué pediría Ernest prestado ese dinero?

translation.en: And without telling me.
In this recession.
Are you sure these people are telling the truth?
translation.es: ¿Estás segura de que esta gente no miente?

translation.en: Well we have to find out. I...
No, it's time to... Let's reach Odogwu.
translation.es: No, es hora de… hablemos con Odogwu.

translation.en: So, daddy, the external auditors showed up today,
translation.es: Papá, hoy hablamos con los auditores externos

translation.en: talking about a loan that you took last year.
translation.es: sobre un préstamo que pediste el año pasado.

translation.en: Nine hundred and fifty million Naira, daddy.
Yes, Odogwu.
I don't know how you took such an amount without telling anybody.
translation.es: No entiendo por qué pediste semejante préstamo sin decirle a nadie. Por Dios.

translation.en: A man's response to an urgent matter
translation.es: La respuesta de un hombre a un asunto urgente

translation.en: determines his character.
Do you understand what I mean?
We needed buses to improve our fleet.  Agreed.
That meant money.
I had no choice but to go to the bank and collect some money.
translation.es: No me quedó más que ir al banco y sacar algo de dinero.

translation.en: - But, daddy-- - You know.
I think you took a huge gamble.
translation.es: Creo que fue un riesgo enorme.

translation.en: It's not like we've been guaranteed the BRT contract.
translation.es: No tenemos garantizado el contrato del TRA.

translation.en: That's another thing. You see, what's so important to me
translation.es: Eso es otra cosa. Para mí lo importante

translation.en: is the loan, and how the bank is going to recover--
translation.es: es el préstamo y lo que banco usará para cobrarse.

translation.en: Their approach is different when recovering their loan.
translation.es: Se portan diferente cuando vienen a cobrar.

translation.en: They will go for your blood when they come back.
translation.es: Irán por tu sangre para cobrarte.

translation.en: There should have been alternatives.
I agree with what you've said.
I got into this business,
principally to take people to various destinations in comfort...
translation.es: principalmente para llevar a la gente a su destino en comodidad…

translation.en: in style.
It has become a legacy with our company.
translation.es: Se convirtió en un distintivo de la compañía.

translation.en: If we lose that legacy, we have lost everything.
Daddy, but right now it seems like we have risked everything.
translation.es: Papá, pero ahora creo que arriesgamos todo.

translation.en: You've put us...
We've been put in such a vulnerable position right now, daddy,
translation.es: Estamos en una posición muy vulnerable ahora, papá.

translation.en: and we don't have that much time on our side.
translation.es: Y no nos queda mucho tiempo.

translation.en: Because of that,
I've decided to invite your Uncle Godswill
translation.es: fue que invité a tu tío Godswill

translation.en: to be a part of this establishment,
translation.es: a ser parte de esta empresa.

translation.en: because I believe that two heads are better than one.
translation.es: Porque creo que dos cabezas piensan mejor que una.

translation.en: Let's see what comes out of the fridge, uh?
translation.es: Veamos qué sale de la heladera, ¿sí?

translation.en: - Morning. - Good morning, Ma. Morning.
Good morning, uncle.
You missed the morning devotion.
I'm sorry. I'm sorry, I was working all night.
translation.es: Lo siento. Trabajé toda la noche.

translation.en: I came up with a plan, uncle.
It's something I call my three- point agenda.
translation.es: Lo llamo plan de tres puntos.

translation.en: Okay. This is good.
- Honestly, I must confess. - Yeah, thank you.
translation.es: - La verdad, lo reconozco. - Sí, gracias.

translation.en: And, here...
take a look.
I've been doing some research myself.
translation.es: También estuve investigando. MAKANO MOTORS: ¿EXPANSIÓN AL SURESTE?

translation.en: A transport company in Kano
needs a merger with another company from Southeast,
translation.es: Una compañía de transporte en Kano necesita una fusión con otra del sureste.

translation.en: and we must not miss this.
I don't think a merger is what we need right now, uncle.
translation.es: No creo que fusionarnos sea la mejor opción ahora, tío.

translation.en: Really?
So what do we need?
Trust me.
This is a plan that has been tried and tested.
It works.
So the first thing we need to do, is get an extension on the 30- day loan.
translation.es: Lo primero es obtener una extensión a los 30 días del préstamo.

translation.en: I mean, technically 29 now,
and I've asked the accountant to set up meetings with all the banks that we owe.
translation.es: Ya le pedí a los contadores que pidan reuniones con todos lo bancos.

translation.en: And I have one for today which is at...
translation.es: Y tengo una para hoy en…

translation.en: now, so I have to go.
translation.es: unos minutos. Me tengo que ir.

translation.en: We have to go.
No, no, uncle, it's okay, I've got this.
translation.es: No, tío, está bien. Yo me encargo.

translation.en: And, besides, you said one of us needs to stay here so--
translation.es: Y, además, dijiste que siempre debe haber uno aquí así que…

translation.en: It doesn't apply here. Listen.
translation.es: Eso no aplica para esto. Escucha.

translation.en: if we have to fight this war, Ada- nna, we have to fight it together,
translation.es: Si vamos a pelear esta lucha, tiene que ser juntos, Adaíta.

translation.en: unless we want to lose.
So... I'm at your service, nationwide.
translation.es: Estoy a tu servicio en todo el país.

translation.en: Let's go.
Okay.
I'm afraid I can't give you an extension.
translation.es: Lo lamento, pero no puedo otorgar la extensión.

translation.en: I can assure you we have a solid chance at the deal, we just need more time.
translation.es: Le aseguro que es muy probable que consigamos el contrato.

translation.en: I'm just asking for you to be patient with us.
translation.es: Solo le pido que sea paciente con nosotros.

translation.en: We're definitely going--
Keep talking.
Go ahead and talk.
I am so sorry.
It wasn't approved.
Use that against them.
Okay, sir.
But don't rush. Take your time.
translation.es: Pero no te apresures. Tómate tu tiempo.

translation.en: Yeah. Okay, sir.
- The minute they get there. - Yeah, I think they're here already.
translation.es: - En cuanto lleguen. - Creo que ya llegaron.

translation.en: Good. Waste their precious time.
translation.es: Bien. Haz que pierdan el tiempo.

translation.en: I'll handle it.
- I do not want to be disturbed. - I'll take care of it, sir.
translation.es: - No quiero que me molesten. - Sí, señor.

translation.en: So, how can I help you, Mr. and Mrs. Obiagu?
translation.es: ¿Cómo puedo ayudarlos, señor y señora Obiagu?

translation.en: No, no. He's my uncle.
Yes, she's my niece.
Okay, I see.
Anyway, we would like to apply for a loan.
We have the track record. We have collateral.
translation.es: Tenemos el historial crediticio, tenemos colateral,

translation.en: But most importantly, we have an impeccable reputation.
translation.es: pero, sobre todo, tenemos una impecable reputación.

translation.en: Lionheart.
Impeccable reputation indeed.
I'm sorry, what's that supposed to mean?
Of course, everyone knows that Lionheart is presently facing bankruptcy.
translation.es: Todo el mundo sabe que Lionheart está al borde de la bancarrota.

translation.en: Plus your father, he's owing so many banks.
translation.es: Y su padre le debe a demasiados bancos.

translation.en: So how come you're asking for a new loan?
Well...
We are not facing bankruptcy.
translation.es: No estamos al borde de la bancarrota.

translation.en: It's just... it's just the times that we're in.
translation.es: Solo son los tiempos que vivimos.

translation.en: It's a minor setback, we'll pull through.
translation.es: Es un pequeño bache, del que saldremos.

translation.en: It's okay, I expect you to say that.
Listen, as the manager,
we know the process of obtaining loans.
translation.es: sabemos cómo se obtiene un préstamo.

translation.en: We're not kids.
Just tell us what it will take for us to get this loan. Finished. Simple.
translation.es: Solo díganos qué tenemos que hacer para que nos den el préstamo. Y ya.

translation.en: Well, I really don't understand.
What don't you understand, for Kingdom's sake?
Look, I give you, you give me. It's give and take. Everything has a price.
translation.es: Mire, usted me da, yo le doy. Es dar y recibir. Todo tiene precio.

translation.en: Even life has a price. Tell us what it will take.
translation.es: Hasta la vida lo tiene. Díganos qué necesita.

translation.en: - Uncle, what are you doing? - I'm doing business.
It's okay, sir, but I hope you are not trying to bribe me.
translation.es: Está bien, señor, pero espero que no esté tratando de sobornarme.

translation.en: - Oh, God. - Oh, no, no... He's not--
Look, what do you mean by bribe?
Tell us what you're waiting for,
I will give it to you. I've told you name any price.
translation.es: Se lo daré. Díganos su precio.

translation.en: It's okay, it's okay. Calm down. You mean?
- Name anything. - My price?
Yes, your price.
Well...
your niece here is not looking bad at all.
translation.es: su sobrina no se ve nada mal.

translation.en: Excuse me?
I mean, she's good.
My price.
Uncle, you shouldn't have.
Abomination.
Yes.
Yes.
Yes.
He punched you?
What a savage.
I see.
Which police station?
Hey!
Excuse me.
Do you know the people that you are toying with? Do you?
You're finished.
Uncle, please, let's not make things any worse.
translation.es: Tío, por favor no lo empeores.

translation.en: - They are right, we are wrong. - Says who?
translation.es: - Ellos tienen razón, nosotros, no. - ¿Según quién?

translation.en: You can't go about bribing and punching people.
translation.es: No puedes ir por ahí sobornando y golpeando gente.

translation.en: Did I punch him? Was a very sluggish jab.
translation.es: ¿Lo golpeé? Fue un puñetazo muy débil.

translation.en: If I had punched him, he would have been in hospital by now.
translation.es: Si lo hubiera golpeado, estaría en el hospital.

translation.en: He doesn't mean it.
At times a jab, one good punch will make a man come back to his senses.
translation.es: A veces un buen golpe hace que un hombre recupere la cordura.

translation.en: Sarge.
Ada. Relax. I know what I'm doing.
translation.es: Ada, cálmate. Sé lo que hago.

translation.en: Don't keep blaming me in their presence.
translation.es: No me culpes más frente a ellos.

translation.en: Your father knows what I can do and that was why he brought me into this.
translation.es: Tu padre sabe de lo que soy capaz. Por eso me trajo.

translation.en: Relax. If I blow hot, you blow cold.
translation.es: Yo funciono en caliente, y tú en frío.

translation.en: So, no one has come for them.
Nobody. Nobody.
- Okay, I'm going for a brief meeting. - Okay, sir.
translation.es: - Tengo que ir a una junta. - Sí, señor.

translation.en: - I'll be back. - Yes, sir.
Onyinye! Thank God you're here.
I can't believe they would actually lock you up in here, like...
translation.es: No puedo creer que la encerraran ahí, como…

translation.en: Do you know who she be? Do you have any idea--
It's, okay, Onyinye, it's fine. I'm okay.
- Just pay the bail money and let's go. - We have a slight problem, Ma.
translation.es: - Paga la fianza y nos iremos. - Hay un problemita.

translation.en: There's an emergency board meeting going on right now at the office.
translation.es: Hay una reunión urgente del consejo en este momento.

translation.en: - Why? What for? - I don't know.
Approved by who?
Samuel. And Igwe Pascal is in the building.
Snakes! Scorpions!
Hurry. Pay the money and let's get out of here.
translation.es: Rápido. Paga para que podamos irnos.

translation.en: Ada- nna, who's this Igwe Pascal, and what does he want?
translation.es: Adaíta, ¿quién es Igwe Pascal y qué quiere?

translation.en: Uncle, I don't know, but whatever it is, I'm sure it's not good.
translation.es: No lo sé tío, pero seguro nada bueno.

translation.en: Madam, he's not letting me pay the bail.
- Why? - I don't know.
What's the problem?
Madam, my superior is not around.
And I can't grant bail if he's not around to sign.
translation.es: No puedo soltarla si no está él para firmar.

translation.en: So, if your boss suddenly dies,
translation.es: Entonces si tu jefe muere en un accidente,

translation.en: we will die here because he's not around.
Well, that's ridiculous. We're ready to go.
Madam, please be patient.  He'll be back soon.
Come on, release us! Are you crazy?
- Release my madam, Officer. - We're ready to pay for bail.
translation.es: - Libere a la señorita, oficial. - Tenemos la fianza.

translation.en: Okay, listen, this is an emergency. We need to leave this place so...
translation.es: Escuche, es una emergencia. Tenemos que irnos para…

translation.en: Look, whatever it takes, what do you want?
Just name your price, but we need to get out of here, please.
translation.es: Diga su precio, pero tenemos que irnos.

translation.en: Ada- nna, is that your voice? You...
bribe?
Uncle, this is different. Okay, talk to me.
Madam, I understand.
But the problem is...
If my superior comes in and he doesn't see a man and a woman here,
translation.es: si mi superior llega y no hay aquí un hombre y una mujer,

translation.en: - he will dismiss me. - So your arrest is based on arithmetic.
translation.es: - perderé mi trabajo. - Arrestan por aritmética.

translation.en: One man, one woman.
Is that what you're telling me?
Don't worry. A man and a woman right? He will meet a man and a woman.
translation.es: No hay problema. ¿Un hombre y una mujer? Los habrá.

translation.en: Just open the gate.
My name is...
It is no more a secret,
that I have an interest in Lionheart.
Unfortunately...
this company...
has lost its vision
and purpose.
Its modus operandi is out of the '40s.
translation.es: Su forma de trabajo es anticuada.

translation.en: Gentlemen and ladies,
I am here to bring the change.
Sarge.
Salute!
What is he doing here?
And in my father's chair.
translation.es: En la silla de mi padre.

translation.en: Calm down, calm down.
Mr. Igwe Pascal is here because I invited him to come here.
translation.es: El señor Igwe Pascal vino porque lo invité.

translation.en: And also because he...
has something very important to share with the board.
translation.es: tiene algo muy importante que compartirle al consejo.

translation.en: Shut that pipe you call mouth!
No other person will betray the company except an albino rat like you.
translation.es: Solo una rata albina como tú traicionaría a la compañía.

translation.en: The board knows about the default on the loan.
translation.es: El consejo ya sabe el estado del préstamo.

translation.en: How could you keep this from them? How could you be so irresponsible?
translation.es: ¿Cómo pudieron ocultárselo? ¿Cómo pudieron ser tan irresponsables?

translation.en: I... can explain.
It's just a minor setback which we have under control.
translation.es: Es solo un pequeño problema que tenemos bajo control.

translation.en: Unfortunately,
Daniel has come to judgment in the person of Mr. Pascal Igwe.
translation.es: Daniel trajo juicio sobre nosotros en la persona del señor Pascal.

translation.en: Now Mr. Pascal Igwe has drawn out a very generous proposal,
translation.es: El señor Pascal preparó una propuesta muy generosa

translation.en: to buy out Lionheart and incorporate it into IG Motors.
translation.es: para comprar Lionheart y hacerla parte de IG Motors.

translation.en: A three billion Naira buy- out.
I, for one would take this course of action
translation.es: Yo tomaría este curso de acción

translation.en: very, very quickly given the limited time we have left.
translation.es: muy rápido dado el tiempo que nos queda.

translation.en: And, let's not forget the recent failures of the Obiagus.
translation.es: Y no olvidemos los errores recientes de los Obiagu.

translation.en: - I beg your pardon! - But!
I cannot honestly say that I can...
translation.es: No puedo decir con sinceridad que

translation.en: trust the Obiagus' ability to...
translation.es: confío en la habilidad de los Obiagu

translation.en: provide the kind of leadership this company needs.
translation.es: para darnos el liderazgo que esta compañía necesita.

translation.en: I was calling you a scorpion, you're worse than a scorpion.
translation.es: Te llamé escorpión, pero eres peor que eso.

translation.en: You're a snake.
You're a vampire.
Gentlemen, there is no need for name- calling.
I am a busy businessman.
translation.es: Soy un hombre de negocios ocupado.

translation.en: I haven't got time for this.
The bank has given you two weeks.
translation.es: El banco les dio dos semanas.

translation.en: I give you ten days to make up your mind.
translation.es: Yo les doy diez días para cambiar de parecer.

translation.en: Good day, gentlemen.
I'll see you off as well.
No, leave him. That's how traitors do.
Sir, Madam.
Please do not listen to this man.
Look, my father built this company on the core values of courage and trust,
translation.es: Mi padre construyó esta compañía sobre el valor y la confianza

translation.en: and I implore you right now to trust me.
translation.es: y les suplico que confíen en mí ahora.

translation.en: My uncle and I have this under control.
translation.es: Mi tío y yo tenemos esto controlado.

translation.en: You ask us to trust you.
Your family has been less than forthcoming
translation.es: Tu familia no ha sido muy abierta

translation.en: - with the board. - Exactly.
Look, finding out about a loan from an outsider is not encouraging.
translation.es: Descubrir sobre el préstamo por un externo no es bueno.

translation.en: It's not.
- We respect your father. - That's right.
translation.es: - Respetamos a tu padre. - Es cierto.

translation.en: But... for the sake of the future of this company,
translation.es: Pero… por el bien del futuro de esta compañía,

translation.en: We have no choice but to consider Mr. Pascal's offer.
translation.es: no nos queda más que considerar la oferta del señor Pascal.

translation.en: Who said you don't have a choice?
We have a choice. Look... And we have just one choice,
translation.es: Tenemos una opción. Miren… Solo hay una opción.

translation.en: - reject his proposal. - No.
- Refuse his offer. - No!
Please, look, if this company falls into the hands of Igwe Pascal,
translation.es: Por favor, si la compañía cae en manos de Igwe Pascal,

translation.en: I can assure you it will be a shadow of itself.
translation.es: les aseguro que será la sombra de lo que fue.

translation.en: Lionheart will not be the company as you know it today.
translation.es: Lionheart no será esta compañía que conocemos.

translation.en: Yes.
So, please give us a chance to make things right, please.
translation.es: Dennos la oportunidad de arreglar esto, por favor.

translation.en: Please.
Igwe gave you ten days, Igwe Pascal.
translation.es: Igwe Pascal te dio diez días.

translation.en: - Take ten days. - Yes.
- Ten days is okay. - That's okay.
translation.es: - Diez días está bien. - Está bien.

translation.en: - No, Chief, even ten days will-- - We'll take it.
translation.es: - No, Jefe, incluso diez días… - Lo tomaremos.

translation.en: - Ten days? - I think is rather impromptu--
And, sorry, but in the foreseeable future, gentlemen...
So...
You don't have to be moody at all. You have...
You have done the best any woman, any man can do.
translation.es: Hiciste todo lo que cualquier hombre o mujer haría.

translation.en: In fact, what you need now is rest.
translation.es: Lo que necesitas ahora es descansar.

translation.en: Rest? Uncle, this is not the time to rest.
translation.es: ¿Descansar? Tío, no es momento para descansar.

translation.en: - Why? - Igwe Pascal is a ruthless business man.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué? - Igwe Pascal no tiene escrúpulos.

translation.en: He doesn't care about Lionheart, or its people, just its assets.
translation.es: No le importa Lionheart, o su gente. Solo los activos.

translation.en: If that man becomes the owner of this company,
translation.es: Si llega a ser dueño de la compañía

translation.en: many people will lose their jobs, I can assure you.
translation.es: muchos perderán su trabajo, eso seguro.

translation.en: God Forbid!
He cannot be. That's number one.
translation.es: Eso no puede pasar. Punto número uno.

translation.en: - What would the families begin to do? - Exactly.
You know you were telling me about your plans.
I want to know all your plans, now.
I assume that this one is plan one.
translation.es: Supongo que este es el plan uno.

translation.en: Well, I was hoping that the BRT contract would go through.
translation.es: Esperaba que lo del TRA se diera.

translation.en: Actually I'm very positive it--
Ada- nna, the BRT is like a a corporate job. It can't be relied on.
translation.es: Adaíta, lo del TRA no se compara con algo corporativo. No es confiable.

translation.en: It can go away at any time.
Just like marriages of the past...
where the woman is idle and eats up the wealth of the man.
translation.es: en los que la mujer no hace nada más que comerse la riqueza del hombre.

translation.en: Unlike what is obtainable now.
Anyway, you might not understand what I'm saying.
translation.es: Seguro no entiendes lo que digo.

translation.en: No, I understand fully, uncle.
That's why I work hard for my money. I'm not here to depend on any man to--
translation.es: Por eso trabajo fuerte, para no depender de ningún hombre…

translation.en: Don't get angry, I didn't mean it that way.
translation.es: No te molestes. No hablaba de eso.

translation.en: I'm not getting angry but I've dated men that...
translation.es: No me molesto. Salí con hombres que…

translation.en: You've dated men that did what?
Did anyone hurt you?
Talk to me, I'm your uncle.
- You have dated men that-- - No, thanks, uncle.
translation.es: - Saliste con hombres que… - No, gracias.

translation.en: But…
I think I know a man we can rely on.
translation.es: Creo que conozco un hombre confiable.

translation.en: Are you sure?
Arinze!
Who is Arinze?
Excuse me.
Excuse me. Sorry, where's Arinze?
Thank you.
Uncle?
You know what, you can just wait here. I'll be back.
- No, let me go with you. - No, it's fine.
- He's alright. It will only take a minute. - Really?
translation.es: - No hay problema. No tardo. - ¿De verdad?

translation.en: - Yes. - Okay. Are you sure you'll be safe?
Hello, how are you?
I'm alright.
- Hey! - Hey.
What a pleasant surprise.
- Hi. - Look at you.
I and my partner, we can supply you with all the vehicles you need.
translation.es: Yo y mi socio podemos darte los vehículos que necesitas.

translation.en: This is our inventory. You can go through it.
translation.es: Este es el inventario. Puedes revisarlo.

translation.en: All the model numbers are there.
translation.es: Tiene los números de los modelos.

translation.en: We can supply to you
only if you can pay that 30% deposit.
translation.es: solo si pagas el 30% de depósito.

translation.en: Okay.
- Well, how is your dad? - Yeah...
- Hope he's recovering? - Oh, he's much better. Thank you.
translation.es: - Espero que mejorando. - Está mucho mejor, gracias.

translation.en: Thank God.
Okay, I won't, uh, take much of your time so you can get back to your stuff.
translation.es: No quiero quitarte mucho tiempo, para que vuelvas a tus cosas.

translation.en: Lionheart is in trouble.
Yeah.
And I need a loan.
Please can you tell him to hurry up. I want to buy myself a new car.
translation.es: Dile que se apresure. Quiero comprarme un auto nuevo.

translation.en: He should pay up fast.
I'm not playing here. I'm a hustler.
translation.es: No estoy jugando. Soy un estafador.

translation.en: What did he say?
Oh, he was saying that...
you have a sense of business, he likes your personality.
translation.es: se ve que usted es bueno en los negocios. Le gusta su personalidad.

translation.en: - Ah, thank you, sir. - That you have an eye for good business.
translation.es: - Gracias, señor. - Qué tiene buen ojo para esto.

translation.en: Thank you. I appreciate it.
We are in debt of 950 million.
Yeah. I'm hoping to raise at least a third of it,
translation.es: Ya sé. Espero lograr reunir un tercio de eso

translation.en: and if I'm able to get that, then--
I will give you 500.
What?
You heard me right.
I will give you 500.
You have 500 million just lying about Arinze, really?
Not really, but I can always work things out.
translation.es: Pues no, pero puedo mover unas cosas.

translation.en: Are you serious?
Of course, I'm very serious.
30% is a little over 100 million.
translation.es: El 30% es poco más de 100 millones.

translation.en: Sounds too good to be true. I don't know.
translation.es: Suena demasiado bueno para ser cierto, no sé.

translation.en: It's not like that, I'm just doing just a giveaway,
translation.es: No es eso. Es una oferta

translation.en: because this is my first business with you.
translation.es: por su primer negocio con nosotros.

translation.en: You need to be mindful of the money so we know our share.
translation.es: Ten cuidado con el dinero para que sepamos cuánto nos toca.

translation.en: Remember Arinze has a cut.
translation.es: Recuerda que Arinze tiene su parte.

translation.en: I'm aware. If I had known, I would have added more money.
translation.es: Ya lo sé. De haber sabido, le agregaba más dinero.

translation.en: Because he's a nice man. That's why I'm giving it to him.
translation.es: Porque es un buen hombre. Por eso se lo doy.

translation.en: That's giving a good price. You understand?
Once he pays...
Hey!
Arinze! My God. Thank you!
Thank you. I promise you I will pay back every penny.
- There is this contract that we're-- - Ada.
Ada, be cool. Enough of all this business talk.
What would you like to drink?
No, I have to go back to the office, I'm on duty so--
translation.es: No, tengo que volver a la oficina, yo…

translation.en: Like, seriously, you go to work like this.
translation.es: En serio, vas a trabajar así.

translation.en: This is, this is a long story. Don't even ask.
translation.es: Es una larga historia. No preguntes.

translation.en: Now you look so tense.
Arinze I'm not, I'm not tense. I'm...
You are tense.
I'm not tense.
You're not?
I don't know you, but if you like your life, you leave now.
translation.es: No te conozco, pero si te gusta vivir, vete ya.

translation.en: I don't... What are you talking about?
These people are not what you think they are.
translation.es: Estas personas no son lo que piensas.

translation.en: They are swind-- What do you call shit at your place?
translation.es: Son estafa… ¿Cómo dices mierda en tu idioma?

translation.en: These are two pieces of kashi. Very bad ones.
translation.es: Estos dos son kashi. Y de los peores.

translation.en: The are swindlers. They are here to... I was here, listening to them in Igbo.
translation.es: Son estafadores. Quieren… Estaban hablando en igbo.

translation.en: You don't understand Igbo. So they are playing you in Igbo.
translation.es: Tú no hablas igbo, así que te estaban engañando.

translation.en: - You know what? - Hm?
I think I have something to get you more relaxed.
translation.es: Creo que tengo algo que te relajará.

translation.en: Like, like what?
Wait. I'm coming.
Arinze?
- Don't listen to this man. - Sorry.
- You can see this man is drunk. - No, no.
translation.es: - Es obvio que está ebrio. - No.

translation.en: - Let's do... We can do this business. - No.
Save your life. Save your money.
translation.es: Salva tu vida. Salva tu dinero.

translation.en: Mr. Hamza. Please, just hold on.
- We can do this business. - No, no.
Look at what you are doing, all this stupid business.
translation.es: Miren nada más lo que hacen con sus negocios.

translation.en: Tarnishing the image of the Igbo people.
translation.es: Arruinan la imagen de los igbo.

translation.en: Why don't you go to the secretariat and look for a job?
Change your clothes and go into farming.
translation.es: Cambien de ropa y háganse granjeros.

translation.en: Agriculture is thriving right now.
translation.es: Le va bien a la agricultura.

translation.en: Go and farm. You are painting us black. Aren't you ashamed?
translation.es: Sean granjeros. Nos dejan mal. ¿No les da vergüenza?

translation.en: No, no. no.
Where are you going?
Where are you going? Have you become a security man?
translation.es: ¿Qué eres ahora de seguridad? ¿Te vas así nada más después de arruinar nuestro negocio?

translation.en: You want to run away after disrupting our deal?
translation.es: ¿Te vas así nada más después de arruinar nuestro negocio?

translation.en: Let me tell you...
We are all Igbo people.
So, Ada...
Ada?
You will have to pay us 30% of the money.
Really?
Yes. You hit him well.
- Ada- nna. - Uncle, we need to go.
Yeah, good idea.
Remain on the ground. Stupid man.
Hello, sir, good afternoon.
I was just coming to see you. Did you get my e- mails?
- Yes, yes I did. - Okay.
But unfortunately, there's little I can do right now.
translation.es: Por desgracia, no hay mucho que pueda hacer ahora mismo.

translation.en: The EFCC is investigating us as we speak.
The Perm Sec has been placed on compulsory leave,
translation.es: El secretario tuvo que dejar el puesto temporalmente,

translation.en: and between you and me, he's not coming back.
So, as it stands now,
I don't have idea of the fate of the BRT project.
translation.es: no sé qué vaya a pasar con el proyecto del TRA.

translation.en: Oh, my God.
It's only God that can save us from this mess.
translation.es: Solo Dios puede salvarnos de este desastre.

translation.en: Thank you.
Madam, I'm very sorry.
My apologies to your father.
This is the change we all believe in.
translation.es: Este es el cambio en el que todos creemos.

translation.en: Good morning, Ma.
Hello. Onyinye?
Is anything wrong?
She didn't come to work?
Leave me alone.
I'm not hungry.
My friend, I'm coming in.
Mummy?
Yes, dear.  I heard you didn't go to work.
translation.es: Sí, cariño. Me dijeron que no fuiste a trabajar.

translation.en: I'm not feeling well.
You're not feeling well.
Onyinye called me.
I'm so tired, mummy.
I'm exhausted.
What is really the problem?
I can't get an extension on the loans.
translation.es: No logro que nos extiendan el préstamo.

translation.en: BRT contract is not forthcoming.
translation.es: El contrato del TRA no pasará.

translation.en: And if this... Igwe Pascal man gets a hold of our company,
translation.es: Y si Igwe Pascal se adueña de la compañía

translation.en: everyone will lose their jobs.
And they are depending on me, and I feel like I'm failing.
translation.es: Y todos dependen de mí. Y siento que les fallo.

translation.en: You have not started and you feel like such a failure?
translation.es: ¿Todavía no empiezas y ya te sientes vencida?

translation.en: Do you know what your father put into setting up this company?
translation.es: ¿Sabes lo que tu padre invirtió para poner la compañía?

translation.en: The challenges, the mistakes, the failures he had to face?
translation.es: ¿Los desafíos, los errores, las fallas que enfrentó?

translation.en: And yet he made it.
What is it they say? It's not over till it's over.
translation.es: ¿Cómo dicen? No se acaba hasta que se acaba.

translation.en: Yes but, mummy, I'm running out of ideas. I don't know what to do.
translation.es: Sí, mamá, pero ya no tengo ideas. No sé qué más hacer.

translation.en: God never gives you a burden he has not equipped you to carry.
translation.es: Dios nunca te da una carga que no puedas llevar.

translation.en: What should I do?
What can I do?
You have your father's business brains. You're a businesswoman.
translation.es: Tienes el cerebro comercial de tu padre. Eres una mujer de negocios.

translation.en: Do away with the sentiments and the emotions.
translation.es: Olvida los sentimentalismos y las emociones.

translation.en: And get the job done. You have it in you.
translation.es: Haz tu trabajo. Tienes la capacidad.

translation.en: Dig deep and get it.
translation.es: Busca dentro de ti y sácala.

translation.en: You've always been able to do anything you put your mind to.
translation.es: Siempre pudiste hacer lo que te propusiste.

translation.en: You can do this.
Thank you, mummy.
You can do this, you're gonna be alright.
Listen, get dressed, come to the house
translation.es: Vístete y ven a la casa

translation.en: and let's have a nice meal.
Your auntie Chioma is around and she's been asking for you.
translation.es: Vino tu tía Chioma y pregunta por ti.

translation.en: - She is? - Yeah.
She came to see her husband. You know those two,
translation.es: Vino a ver a su marido. Ya los conoces.

translation.en: they never stay away from each other for too long.
translation.es: Nunca se separan por mucho tiempo.

translation.en: Come on, get dressed.
- Okay, I'll see you there. - Alright.
Good evening.
- Oh, Ada- nna. - Aunty.
Ada... You are looking beautiful.
What?
She looks tiny. Are you people feeding her?
Can't you see food everywhere? You ask if she is being fed.
translation.es: ¿No ves la comida? Preguntas si la alimentan.

translation.en: Don't allow your father and uncle to tear you apart.
translation.es: No dejes que tu padre y tu tío te exploten.

translation.en: Take it easy.
Please don't blame anybody. She goes to the gym.
translation.es: No nos culpes. Va al gimnasio.

translation.en: Gym?
Fashion. That's the trend these days.
translation.es: La moda. Es cosa de jóvenes.

translation.en: I heard the first daughter of John Bosco
translation.es: Me dijeron que la primogénita de John Bosco

translation.en: is getting married next month.
John Bosco looked at his son- in- law
translation.es: John Bosco vio a su yerno

translation.en: and felt he looked really skinny.
He then asked him,
Can you take care of my daughter looking this way?
translation.es: ¿Puedes cuidar a mi hija viéndote así?

translation.en: He replied,
My in- law, it is all in God's hands.
translation.es: Suegro, todo está en manos de Dios.

translation.en: John Bosco replied, I have heard you.
Let me tell you the truth… You don't understand what the son- in- law meant...
translation.es: Te diré la verdad… No entiendes lo que quería decir el yerno.

translation.en: The God he was referring to, was John Bosco.
translation.es: Cuando decía Dios se refería a John Bosco.

translation.en: He will call him God- John Bosco if you let him.
translation.es: Le dirá Dios-John Bosco si lo deja.

translation.en: It's not a lie.
That's young men of today.
Saying it is in the hands of God implies it is in the hands of John Bosco.
translation.es: Decir que está en manos de Dios significa en manos de John Bosco.

translation.en: John Bosco is God.
Let me tell you, that's what we suffer nowadays. When a young man wants to marry...
translation.es: Te diré que eso es lo que pasa ahora.

translation.en: he'll first ask around if the parents are wealthy.
translation.es: Cuando un joven quiere casarse primero pregunta si los padres tienen dinero.

translation.en: If both the parents are not wealthy, he disappears.
translation.es: Si no tienen, desaparece. Se esfuma.

translation.en: He's gone.
My sister, it is just tiring. It's too much.
That's how a child will carry on something too heavy to handle.
translation.es: Así es como un niño lleva algo pesado.

translation.en: My dear, if such a man comes for you... run!
translation.es: Cariño, si un hombre así se te acerca, ¡corre!

translation.en: Make sure your feet hit your ears as you run.
translation.es: Hasta que te duelan los pies.

translation.en: It is not that you see a man and start running...
translation.es: No es que veas un hombre y corras…

translation.en: because you might be in this sort of race and run past your future husband...
translation.es: porque podrías estar corriendo y no ver a tu futuro marido

translation.en: then, we won't get to drink on your wedding day.
translation.es: y entonces no beberemos en tu boda.

translation.en: How it is done is that, first, you study the man...
translation.es: Lo que hay que hacer es primero estudiar al hombre.

translation.en: if he is a reasonable person, you accept him.
translation.es: Lo que hay que hacer es primero estudiar al hombre. Si es una persona razonable, lo aceptas.

translation.en: But if it's any of those men that sag their trousers to their knees...
translation.es: Pero si es de esos que se ponen los pantalones en las rodillas,

translation.en: Run!
Because these children feel like they are of marriageable age...
translation.es: Porque esos niños creen que ya están en edad de casarse…

translation.en: If a child tried to tie a wrapper before maturity, when the wind comes--
translation.es: Si un niño ata un lazo antes de la madurez,

translation.en: It will blow him away along with the wrapper.
translation.es: al llegar el viento volarán tanto él como el lazo.

translation.en: Obiora, you have heard what they said. What do you want to do with your life?
translation.es: Obiora, escuchaste lo que dijeron. ¿Qué quieres hacer con tu vida?

translation.en: What sort of question is that?  He asked you a question.
translation.es: - ¿Qué clase de pregunta es esa? - Responde.

translation.en: So the music I am into isn't beneficial to my life?
I'm a musician. You've always known this is what I do.
translation.es: Soy un músico. Siempre supieron que eso hago.

translation.en: Music is your choice of profession?
You know you are Igbo?
Essentially, every day you move around with an instrument all in the name of music?
translation.es: ¿Cada día vas por ahí con un instrumento en nombre de la música?

translation.en: Was Osadebe not an Igbo man?
Is it not his music you always play in this house?
translation.es: ¿No escuchan siempre su música en esta casa?

translation.en: Chief, he got you there!
You win.
You win, before I choke.
At least I have not gone to jail like Ada and Uncle Goddy.
translation.es: Al menos no fui a prisión, como Ada y el tío Goddy.

translation.en: Leave me out of it.
you cannot go to jail.
translation.es: Obiora, no puedes ir a prisión.

translation.en: You look like a new baby's bath water.
translation.es: Pareces agua de baño de bebé recién nacido.

translation.en: If you go to jail, will you come out alive?
See your beard looking like that of Nebuchadnezzar.
It will be the first thing they shave with a bottle.
translation.es: será lo primero que te rasuren con una botella.

translation.en: At least I look like my father with the beard.
translation.es: Al menos me parezco a mi padre con la barba.

translation.en: You know I support you, but I'm just telling you the truth.
translation.es: Sabes que te apoyo, pero digo la verdad.

translation.en: Are you saying I don't work hard?
Please, let's eat, before I choke on pepper.
translation.es: Comamos ya, antes que me atragante.

translation.en: Hi daddy.
Ada, how are you?
I'm good.
How are you?
Well, I am grateful to God for my life.
translation.es: Pues le agradezco a Dios por estar vivo.

translation.en: But you see there comes a time in the life of a man
translation.es: Pero llega la hora en la vida de un hombre

translation.en: when he decides to take stock.
I've come to realize that most men invest all their time
translation.es: Me doy cuenta de que la mayoría de los hombres

translation.en: in matters of transient value,
translation.es: invierten su vida en cosas de valor pasajero

translation.en: at the expense of what they should cherish,
translation.es: a expensas de lo que deberían valorar

translation.en: what they should value,
like love,
life,
family.
I waited eight years for you to be born.
translation.es: Esperé ocho años para que nacieras.

translation.en: Those were years of trepidation.
And you came and you became a source of pride and joy to me.
translation.es: Y cuando llegaste, me diste orgullo y gozo.

translation.en: I have watched you grow,
and I'm so confident in your ability.
translation.es: y confío mucho en tus habilidades.

translation.en: The biggest legacy...
I would leave for posterity...
is you.
My daughter.
I'm not thinking about death, but...
translation.es: No pienso en la muerte, pero…

translation.en: Marie Connely said, In the midst of life we are in death,
translation.es: Marie Connely dijo: Al ir por la vida estamos en la muerte

translation.en: so occasionally when we talk about life, there's always death hovering around.
translation.es: así que al hablar de la vida, la muerte siempre nos acecha.

translation.en: You are the pendulum of my life.
translation.es: Tú eres el péndulo de mi vida.

translation.en: If you stop swinging,
then I am done.
I'm proud of you. You mean so much to me. Come on. Come on.
translation.es: Estoy orgulloso de ti. Significas mucho para mí. Ven.

translation.en: Thank you, daddy.
I'm proud of you, I'm proud of you.
I'm proud of you. Yeah. Sit down.
translation.es: Estoy orgulloso de ti. Sí, siéntate.

translation.en: Please help me.
Madam, if you want to go straight to Lagos, get into the bus.
translation.es: Señora, si va directo a Lagos, súbase.

translation.en: But if you intend on stopping in Sagamu, then go to Lionheart.
translation.es: Pero si quiere bajar en Sagamu, vaya a Lionheart.

translation.en: This bus is going straight to Lagos. We are not stopping over at Sagamu.
translation.es: Nosotros vamos directo a Lagos. No nos detenemos en Sagamu.

translation.en: Why will you tell me to go to Lionheart and pay 6,000 Naira
translation.es: ¿Por qué me dices que vaya a Lionheart y pague 6,000 nairas

translation.en: when my destination is Sagamu? Am I going to Lagos?
translation.es: para ir a Sagamu? ¿Voy a Lagos?

translation.en: Madam.
Since you knew you were going to Sagamu, you should have come here on time.
translation.es: Si iba a Sagamu, debió llegar antes.

translation.en: The vehicles that travel to Sagamu left the park already.
translation.es: Los vehículos que van a Sagamu ya se fueron.

translation.en: If you want to go to Lagos, then get into the bus. If not, please leave.
translation.es: Si quiere ir a lagos, súbase. Si no, váyase.

translation.en: This is the Peace Express to Lagos. We don't make multiple stops.
translation.es: Este es un transporte exprés a Lagos. No hacemos paradas.

translation.en: - Morning, morning. - Morning, Ma.
Not now. Get the GM.
I want all available drivers assembled in the meeting hall. Now.
translation.es: Quiero a todos los conductores posibles en una junta. Ya.

translation.en: - Okay. - Morning.
They're faster.
We can't navigate those narrow roads.
Ask the small bus drivers, they know!
The small buses are always at full capacity.
Our fares are too expensive.
How much is it?
Our big buses cannot compete.
Not on speed, routes, rates... nothing!
Our passengers are becoming impatient.
The small bus companies are killing us right now.
translation.es: Las compañías de camionetas nos ahorcan.

translation.en: To reduce our rates, we should invest in small buses.
translation.es: Para bajar la tarifa, necesitamos invertir en camionetas. Eso es.

translation.en: Ada- nna.
You look moody. Why?
Let's just say...
I now understand what you've been talking about all this while.
translation.es: ahora entiendo lo que has dicho todo el tiempo.

translation.en: Well, I'm happy you eventually realize it.
translation.es: Me da gusto que lo descubrieras.

translation.en: The major thing is to understand at your own time. It's good.
translation.es: Lo mejor es entender a tu propio tiempo.

translation.en: Where we going to get small buses from?
We can't afford to buy any more buses at this time.
translation.es: No podemos comprar nada a esta hora.

translation.en: Yes, we can't afford to buy it, but where...
we can achieve it.
You know.
I talked to you once.
They have been looking for a way to enter the East.
Maybe if we push for the merger with them, it's solved.
translation.es: Si buscamos la fusión, quizá se resuelva.

translation.en: Maikano Motors is a very big transport company, uncle.
translation.es: Maikano Motors es una compañía muy grande, tío.

translation.en: I know.
I don't know if they'll go with the idea of a merger.
translation.es: No sé si les atraiga la idea de una fusión.

translation.en: Why not?
Listen, this is one thing that they have been looking for, for a very long time, to enter the East.
translation.es: Es algo que llevan buscando mucho tiempo, llegar al este.

translation.en: Preferably with a reputable and big transport company,
translation.es: Es mejor con una compañía grande con buena reputación,

translation.en: which we are.
So...
They find what they're looking for,
and they have the small buses we are looking for, so...
translation.es: y tienen las camionetas que necesitamos.

translation.en: Since the food is delicious, the soup looks good,
translation.es: Como la comida es deliciosa, la sopa se ve bien.

translation.en: what stops the visitor from eating?
Okay.
I think it's worth a try.
Good.
I'll get them to set up a meeting and then we'll--
No, no, no, no...
- Don't be so fast, Ada. - What?
You need to take out the log of wood from the top
translation.es: Primero hay que quitar el madero de arriba

translation.en: before the one below.
If you understand my gist.
- No, no, no! - Odogwu--
Nobody will take my company away from me. Nobody! No.
translation.es: Nadie me quitará mi compañía. ¡Nadie! No.

translation.en: It is a merger. Nobody's taking your company away from you.
translation.es: Es una fusión. Nadie te quita la compañía.

translation.en: What is the difference between a merger, and what Igwe Pascal propose? Tell me.
translation.es: ¿Qué diferencia hay entre una fusión y la propuesta de Igwe Pascal?

translation.en: Well, Igwe Pascal wants to buy us out.
And we both know that will be the end of Lionheart if he did.
translation.es: Ambos sabemos que eso será el fin de Lionheart.

translation.en: But with a merger with Maikano we can still,
translation.es: Pero podemos fusionarnos. Con Maikano podemos

translation.en: have some sort of control over our destiny.
Chief, listen to what your daughter is saying.
Listen to her. We have run out of options completely.
They will not grant us extension on this loan.
translation.es: No nos darán una extensión al préstamo.

translation.en: And no bankers want to give us any other loan as it stands now.
translation.es: Y ningún banquero quiere darnos otro préstamo.

translation.en: So it's either Maikano, or Igwe Pascal, which we don't want.
translation.es: Solo queda Maikano o Igwe Pascal, y eso no es lo que queremos.

translation.en: And, they are Hausa?
Daddy, come on, this is business.
Alright.
What if Maikano does not accept our terms? You tell me.
translation.es: ¿Y si Maikano no acepta nuestros términos?

translation.en: Oh, daddy, leave that to me. Leave that to us.
translation.es: - Eso déjamelo a mí. - Déjanoslo a nosotros.

translation.en: Throw the bone to us dogs and leave the fight to us and the spirits.
translation.es: Lánzanos el hueso a los perros, y pelearemos junto a los espíritus.

translation.en: We can do it. You have said it yourself.
Yeah.
...such as for...
We request...
They, to apply the application...
Sorry to interrupt you.
You remember me?
The house with the pool with all the women.
translation.es: La casa con la piscina y las mujeres.

translation.en: - House with the pool... - You saved me from being duped
translation.es: - Casa con la piscina… - Me salvó de una estafa

translation.en: by those fraudsters.
- How are you? - I'm very well.
It's a small world.
Hey, you know, I never got a chance to thank you the other day.
translation.es: Nunca pude agradecerle por ese día.

translation.en: - Yes. - I'm glad I have the opportunity - to express my gratitude now. - No, you don't need
translation.es: - Sí. - Me alegra poder agradecerle ahora.

translation.en: to worry yourself. Just do good to any human being you see anywhere
translation.es: No hace falta. Haga un bien a alguien más

translation.en: because you never know what tomorrow will turn out to be.
translation.es: porque nunca se sabe lo que viene mañana.

translation.en: - You're right. Thank you very much. - It turned out well. - Thank you. -
translation.es: - Tiene razón. Muchas gracias. - Todo salió bien.

translation.en: Sorry. Meet my niece. Adaeze.
- It's a pleasure. - Pleased to meet you.
So where are you both headed?
We are... actually, we're going to Kano.
Oh wow. I hope all is well.
translation.es: Vaya. Espero que todo esté bien.

translation.en: All is well. We want to meet...
one business mogul in Kano.
translation.es: con un gran empresario en Kano.

translation.en: You know, Alhaji Maikano.
Want to see if we can strike a deal with him.
translation.es: Queremos ver si conseguimos un trato con él.

translation.en: Have you met him before?
No, no, no, no. But I intend to see him when I get to Kano.
translation.es: No. Esperamos hacerlo al llegar a Kano.

translation.en: - Wow. - Yes.
Well, let me introduce myself. My name is Hamza Maikano.
translation.es: Permítame presentarme. Mi nombre es Hamza Maikano.

translation.en: - Hamza who? - Yes.
The man over there is my father. Alhaji Danladi Maikano.
translation.es: Ese hombre allá es mi padre, Alhaji Danladi Maikano.

translation.en: Maikano of Maikano Transport?
Yes.
- What? - We are actually on our way to Kano.
So you can come with us. I will make an introduction.
translation.es: Pueden venir con nosotros. Los presentaré.

translation.en: - And I can help you with your bags. - Yes, yes.
Wow!
Not now, uncle, wait.
Ada- nna.
You will discuss with this man alone. I will stay on the flank.
translation.es: Tú hablarás con este hombre sola. Yo estaré al margen.

translation.en: But uncle, we are meant to be in this together.
I know we are in this together.
But look, you are a leader. He sees a leader.
translation.es: Pero tú eres una líder. Él ve una líder.

translation.en: Leadership is not easy.
Talk with him one on one.
The head of one organization
versus the head of the other organization.
translation.es: con la cabeza de otra organización.

translation.en: Go, don't be scared. I am around.
translation.es: Ve, no tengas miedo. Estoy cerca.

translation.en: Okay.
Don't be scared.
- You're welcome. - Yeah, thank you.
Do have a seat, Miss Obiagu.
- Thank you, sir. - Yeah.
So, how is your father?
I've not met him, but he has quite a reputation.
translation.es: No lo conozco, pero tiene una excelente reputación.

translation.en: Well, he's doing very well. Thank you for asking.
translation.es: Está muy bien. Gracias por preguntar.

translation.en: So what can I do for you?
Well, sir, I'm aware you are trying to enter the Eastern region.
translation.es: Señor, entiendo que busca entrar a la región oriental.

translation.en: Well, I'm here to let you know
Lionheart Transport is willing to make your transition a smooth one.
translation.es: que Lionheart desea que esa transición les sea fluida.

translation.en: Really?
Yes, we have a fleet of 200 buses
translation.es: Sí, tenemos una flotilla de 200 autobuses

translation.en: and cater to over 50,000 people weekly,
translation.es: y atendemos a 50,000 personas a la semana,

translation.en: not to mention 30 years of experience that we have under our belt.
translation.es: además de los 30 años de experiencia que tenemos.

translation.en: So I think that...
if there was some sort of merger between your company and ours,
I think the sky will be the limit, sir.
translation.es: el cielo sería el límite, señor.

translation.en: That sounds like a well- rehearsed pitch, my dear.
translation.es: Suena a una propuesta muy bien ensayada, cariño.

translation.en: It's not a pitch, sir.
Then convince me. Why should my company match with yours?
translation.es: Entonces, convénceme. ¿Por qué debería unir mi compañía a la tuya?

translation.en: Well, sir...
I grew up in a bus park.
My father started taking me to work way before I could crawl.
translation.es: Mi padre me llevó al trabajo desde que podía gatear.

translation.en: I saw people come and go,
translation.es: Vi a la gente ir y venir,

translation.en: each with their own different agendas.
translation.es: cada quien con su fin particular.

translation.en: You see,
family is a core value upon which Lionheart was built.
translation.es: la familia es el valor central sobre el que se construyó Lionheart.

translation.en: I understood this early and as I've grown older,
translation.es: Lo entendí pronto y, al crecer,

translation.en: I have realized that our growth is based on how we treat others.
translation.es: me di cuenta de que crecimos por cómo tratamos a los demás.

translation.en: The same way you have, sir.
translation.es: Y ese es su estilo también, señor.

translation.en: Your grandfather built Maikano Motors 65 years ago.
translation.es: Su abuelo creó Maikano Motors hace 65 años.

translation.en: Then he passed it on to your father and now, you wear the crown.
translation.es: Él pasó la compañía a su padre y hoy usted lleva la corona.

translation.en: You do understand the importance of succession and longevity.
translation.es: Ustedes entienden la importancia de la sucesión y la longevidad.

translation.en: You've done quite some research.
Sir.
Maikano motors is one of the leading transport companies.
translation.es: Maikano Motors es una compañía de transporte líder.

translation.en: I mean with emphasis to the North.
translation.es: Con un énfasis en el norte.

translation.en: But, Lionheart Transportation is the heart and the soul of the Southeast.
translation.es: Pero Lionheart es el corazón y el alma del sureste.

translation.en: My belief is that...
with your capital and our technical know- how,
translation.es: con su capital y nuestro conocimiento técnico,

translation.en: if we come together as one,
we would be a force to be reckoned within the transportation business.
translation.es: seríamos una fuerza sin igual en el negocio del transporte.

translation.en: And not to mention...
most importantly, we share the same values.
translation.es: la importancia de que compartimos los mismos valores.

translation.en: So, how did it go with my father?
Reasonably well, I believe.
Though he says he has to think on it, so, fingers crossed.
translation.es: Dice que debe pensarlo, así que habrá que esperar.

translation.en: He's never been one to make hasty decision.
No, he said the same thing.
But I really do believe that this would be a mutually beneficial deal
translation.es: Pero en verdad creo que sería un acuerdo que nos beneficie a ambos

translation.en: if it does go through.
I... I think so too.
So thank you.
I don't know if I have thanked you for everything.
translation.es: Creo que no le agradecí por su ayuda.

translation.en: We wouldn't have come this far if you hadn't, you know--
translation.es: Nunca hubiéramos llegado aquí si usted…

translation.en: Stop. Stop thanking me. I know exactly what it's like to be in your shoes.
translation.es: No me agradezca. Sé exactamente lo que es estar en su lugar.

translation.en: Is that so? How come?
You see, for starters, this isn't just a business for you.
translation.es: Para empezar, esto no es un negocio para usted.

translation.en: This is personal.
This is your family.
This is about proving your worth to anyone who matters, especially your dad.
translation.es: Es demostrarle a todos su valor, en especial a su padre.

translation.en: I know what it's like to be living under their shadows.
translation.es: Sé lo que es vivir a su sombra.

translation.en: They've done so much for us on a platter, and the only way...
translation.es: Nos dieron todo en bandeja de plata

translation.en: to pay them back is to show that we can actually bring something to the table.
translation.es: y solo podemos pagarles mostrando que de verdad podemos contribuir.

translation.en: How did you think I ended up in Enugu, almost scammed in a business
translation.es: ¿Cómo cree que acabé en Enugu, al borde del fraude en un negocio que esperaba que resolviera nuestro problema con el este?

translation.en: I hoped would solve our in- roads to the East?
translation.es: en un negocio que esperaba que resolviera nuestro problema con el este?

translation.en: I wanted to impress him so bad and earn his respect.
translation.es: Quería impresionarlo y ganarme su respeto.

translation.en: So yes, I understand.
So no need to keep thanking me.
I'm sure your father is proud of you.
translation.es: Su padre sin duda está orgulloso de usted.

translation.en: We have to be going.
it's getting late and...
translation.es: Es tarde y no alcanzaremos vuelo.

translation.en: we can't make the last flight so we have to check into a hotel.
translation.es: Es tarde y no alcanzaremos vuelo. Buscaremos un hotel. ¿Puede reco…?

translation.en: - Can you rec-- - No, no,your things are in the car.
translation.es: No. Tengo sus cosas en el auto.

translation.en: I have instructed the driver to take you to our guest house.
translation.es: Le instruí al chofer que los lleve a la casa de huéspedes.

translation.en: - No, please, you've done enough already. - I insist.
Thank you.
You're welcome.
Thank you.
Thank you so much and Alhaji and we'll be hoping to hear from you.
translation.es: Muchas gracias por todo. Alhaji, esperamos noticias suyas.

translation.en: - It's okay. - Yes.
Alright, Adaeze.
Did they provide transportation for us?
Yes. It's taking us to their guest house.
translation.es: Vamos a su casa de huéspedes.

translation.en: Thank you, Alhaji. Thank you. Thank you very much.
Kola.
Thank you.
What's going on?
Nothing.
Honestly, your father is so stubborn.
translation.es: La verdad es que tu padre es un terco.

translation.en: I heard you're getting better.
Of course I'm getting better. Can't you see that?
translation.es: Claro que estoy mejor. ¿No tiene ojos?

translation.en: I'm not expected to die anytime soon.
I'm getting better.
The way things are turning out, I'll have to sleep over in this town.
translation.es: A este paso, tendré que pasar la noche aquí.

translation.en: If you need a place to stay,
I also have a guest house.
You understand Hausa?
I was born in Zaria.
I studied there.
We roamed the city.
To be honest, I enjoyed the yoghurt... and the millet cakes.
translation.es: Para ser sincero, me encantaba el yogur y las tortitas de mijo.

translation.en: That's surprising.
It was us against the world.
You have to do something, because we're going to...
translation.es: Tienes que hacer algo porque vamos a…

translation.en: O... kay.
I promise you, they weren't doing that a minute ago.
translation.es: Te juro que no estaban así hace un minuto.

translation.en: Ada- nna, why do you get yourself worked up for nothing?
translation.es: Adaíta, ¿por qué te preocupas de nada?

translation.en: They are laughing. They are smiling, they are happy.
I see that.
No worries, let me join them.
translation.es: No te preocupes. Iré con ellos.

translation.en: Right, I think it's about time we started this meeting.
translation.es: Bien, creo que es hora de comenzar esta junta.

translation.en: - There's no point in waiting any longer. - Yes.
translation.es: - No tiene caso esperar más. - Sí.

translation.en: - Go ahead. - Three billion now is not something,
translation.es: - Bien. - Tres mil millones no es algo

translation.en: you know, to pass on.
Not so fast, not so fast.
Get out of this seat. Come on.
- Out. - Out of this seat.
Please, sit.
- Mr. Chairman, welcome. - Thank you very much.
Chief.
What a surprise, Sir.
Yes, a wonderful surprise.
Anybody who is on trial
is offered an opportunity to defend himself
before his accusers, don't you think so?
translation.es: ante quienes lo acusan. ¿No es así?

translation.en: Yes, Chief, but you are not under any trial here sir.
translation.es: Sí, Jefe, pero no es un juicio.

translation.en: No, no, no. Come on, I'm under trial.
translation.es: No. Por favor, claro que lo es.

translation.en: You...
you accused my family of...
incompetence, of ineptitude,
and not satisfied with that,
to make matters worse,
you bring into my family this, this poor chap, this, this, this rascal.
translation.es: traes a mi casa a este tipo, a este patán.

translation.en: Chief Obiagu,
there is no need for name- calling here.
This is business.
No hard feelings.
No hard feelings.
Pascal, you're an animal.
Insult me all you want. But...
translation.es: Insúltame todo lo que quieras, pero…

translation.en: it will not change what is about to happen here.
translation.es: eso no cambiará lo que está a punto de pasar aquí.

translation.en: My offer is up...
and you have lost.
If I were you, I wouldn't be too sure.
You read it carefully.
Sorry, what, what, what's this?
It might help if you read.
Contract papers. We have a new offer on the table.
translation.es: Es un contrato. Tenemos otra oferta.

translation.en: In the past 30 years,
my family has...
faced up to all sorts of challenges.
We are faced with another challenge.
The challenge, more trying this time, the challenge of change.
translation.es: Este desafío es más duro. Es el desafío de cambiar.

translation.en: This talks about expansion.
You don't have the capital for that.
translation.es: No tienen el dinero para eso.

translation.en: You think so?
Yes, I know so.
Ladies and gentlemen, I would like to introduce to you
the newest shareholder of Lionheart.
Alhaji Danladi Maikano, and his son, Hamza.
translation.es: Alhaji Danladi Maikano y su hijo, Hamza.

translation.en: That's impossible.
Really?
We've struck a deal with Maikano Motors, to combine our fleet.
translation.es: Hicimos un trato con Maikano Motors para combinar nuestra flotilla.

translation.en: If you look at the contracts before you, you will see that this is a mutually beneficial merger.
translation.es: En los contratos frente a ustedes notarán una fusión que beneficia a ambas partes.

translation.en: One that allows us to explore and expand beyond the shores
translation.es: Nos permite explorar y expandirnos más allá de las orillas

translation.en: without having to buy small buses.
But, most importantly,
it allows us to retain control of Lionheart.
translation.es: es que nos permite mantener el control de Lionheart.

translation.en: Beautiful. Wonderful.
This is...
absolute rubbish.
Are you still here?
- Get up! And out. - Your continued stay
is an extension of your irrelevance.
Could you leave, please?
Beautiful baby.
Please.
Welcome, Maikano.
Thank you, my brother.
At this point, I must have to make an announcement.
translation.es: Quiero aprovechar para hacer un anuncio.

translation.en: I want to retire from my position of MD and CEO
translation.es: Me retiraré de mi puesto de gerente general y director general

translation.en: of this company.
I think I have groomed a successor,
translation.es: Creo que la persona que tomará el puesto está lista:

translation.en: my daughter Adaeze,
because I believe she has all the virtues
translation.es: porque creo que tienen todas las virtudes

translation.en: required to run this company.
translation.es: que se necesitan para dirigir la empresa.

translation.en: In order to ensure that I am not inflicting her on you,
translation.es: Para asegurarme de que no sea una imposición

translation.en: you just must might put this to vote, if you'd like to.
- Oh, yes. Yes. - But I recommend her heavily.
translation.es: - Claro, sí. - Pero la recomiendo ampliamente.

translation.en: Why not.
All in support say aye.
translation.es: Los que estén de acuerdo digan sí.

translation.en: Aye.
The ayes have it. There's no nay.
translation.es: Ganan los sí. No hay no.

translation.en: Well...
- My daughter. - Thank you, daddy.
Ada- nna.
- Thank you. - Congratulations.
Yes.
May I?
Congratulations.
Hello.
Hello.
Alhaji. I hope you enjoy yourself.
translation.es: Alhaji, espero que la pases bien.

translation.en: - I intend to enjoy myself. - Beautiful.
Can I get something...
What is it? Okay.
I'm tired.
By the way,
I want to change the carpet in that office.
translation.es: quiero cambiar la alfombra de la oficina.

translation.en: That burgundy just does my head in.
- Blue-- - I think you have an admirer, Ma.
What?
Stop staring, Onyinye.
Hi, Adaeze.
Hamza, hi.
How are you?
Very well. Are you... Are you having a good time?
Oh yeah, yeah.
I'm Onyinye. Leaving.
Okay.
I thought he's into hip- hop?
Is this going to be good?
You don't know your son. You'll soon see what he'll do.
translation.es: No lo conoces. Ya verás lo que hace.

translation.en: - My brother! - Oh, okay.
Good evening, ladies and gentlemen.
First of all, I just want to say a big congratulations to my dad...
translation.es: Primero que nada, quiero felicitar a mi padre…

translation.en: on his retirement.
And I have a special song for you...
translation.es: Y tengo una canción para ti…

translation.en: It's titled Obiagu.
Wow.
Open the gate.
You always underrate me!
- Isn't it the same work we do? -
Yet, you ask me to open the gate.
translation.es: Pero me ordenas que abra la reja.

translation.en: Are you talking to me in that manner?
It seems something is wrong with you.
